title: PETITE MARGUERITE, WHITE SAPPHIRE SILVER RIVIÈRE NECKLACE
description: A smaller take on our original, the Petite Marguerite makes its grand entrance with flower-shaped lab-grown white sapphires set in sterling silver.
details:
Metal: Sterling silver
Setting: Cluster set
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Round cut
Width, Top to Bottom of Flower:  1.8mm



15 inches, 12.25 CTW DEW
16 inches, 13.13 CTW DEW
18 inches, 14.87 CTW DEW
